speech._main: [Name]. You did it! It is an honor to address you today because despite all the odds you persevered and you [thing they did]. In the words of Les Brown, “Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you’ll land among the stars.” Whether you’re basking in the moon’s glow or swimming amongst the stars, you accomplished [thing they did]. I hope  you take time to celebrate yourself today for boldly charting your path forward to success.
